TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Verify the ability to create and exchange a hostile Unit in a nation's C2IS.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Nation A creates a hostile Unit. Nation B receives the information and interprets it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: Nation A has created the 'Ground Picture > Forces' topic. Nation B has subscribed to this Topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the hostile Unit is displayed correctly on both Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates a message element for a Unit with HostilityStatusCode=Hostile
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the Unit correctly.
